lines.text: Will someone tell me what's going on? Is Amber all right?
Well, it seems like Amber has a slight
Worse. She met a chef in Rome over the summer, and she ate her way into a size twenty!
You know, you are going to love your new home in Bellevue. It is so woodsy there!
Great. I can start a tick collection.
I'm sorry, I totally forgot about dinner.
This chicken has been in the oven for three hours!

[feels pot]
Not to mention the two hours of roast-and-broast, at least we know that we wont be getting salmonella.
What makes you think this is Take-Out?

[grabs packet]
Well you left the salsa in, besides, you don't cook.
That's weasel. Get your vermin straight.
